channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
My compiler will not work for some reason. It was working like a couple weeks ago but the other say just stopped working. My compiler says this: [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
When i compile it, the error it gives me is: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: clickingMost/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: clickingMost.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Can someone please help me please?

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @ashman335 ashman335
item.description:
@ashman335 wrote:

[quote=“tennisbro, post:1, topic:272840”]My compiler will not work for some reason. It was working like a couple weeks ago but the other say just stopped working. My compiler says this: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

When i compile it, the error it gives me is: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: clickingMost/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: clickingMost.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

Can someone please help me please?[/quote]

Make Sure You Have Java JDK Installed And Go To
C:\Program Files\Java

Check Your Jre And Jdk Folders

  • Mine Are Jre1.6.0_07 *
    Now In The Compiler Edit It To Say
    Your Jre And Then Save It
    Run The Compiler And It Should Work
    If Not Then I Have No Clue =\

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @tennisbro tennisbro
item.description:
@tennisbro wrote:

My compiler will not work for some reason. It was working like a couple weeks ago but the other say just stopped working. My compiler says this: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

When i compile it, the error it gives me is: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: clickingMost/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: clickingMost.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

Can someone please help me please?
